arts.ttl: Revealed: Virgil van Dijk contacted Real Madrid over free transfer before signing Liverpool contract as Spanish giants opted to pursue Dean Huijsen instead
arts.sum: Rooney said: "Virgil van Dijk and Mohamed Salah, they've signed new deals but I don't think they've really led that team this season. Liverpool have struggled for consistency this season despite retaining Van Dijk and investing heavily during a major summer transfer window.

arts.sum: There's a heavyweight Champions League clash taking place at Anfield this Tuesday as Liverpool welcome 15-time winners Real Madrid to Merseyside. The Reds come into the game having taken six points...

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold mural appears to be 'defaced' before Liverpool vs Real Madrid clash
arts.sum: A tribute to former Liverpool defender Trent Alexander-Arnold appears to have been vandalised hours before his Champions League return to Anfield with Real Madrid

arts.ttl: Valverde, Camavinga start in a 4-3-3 – How Real Madrid can line up against Liverpool
arts.sum: Real Madrid are preparing for one of their most daunting European tests yet, which is a trip to Anfield to face Liverpool in the UEFA Champions League group stage. arts.ttl: Will Trent Alexander-Arnold play against Liverpool for Real Madrid in the Champions League tonight?
arts.sum: The full-back is pushing to start after returning from injury

arts.ttl: Real Madrid pay tribute to Diogo Jota ahead of Champions League tie with Liverpool
arts.sum: Ahead of their clash with Liverpool on Tuesday night, a delegation from Real Madrid attended Diogo Jota’s memorial to pay tribute to the deceased forward and his brother, Andre. The pair tragically passed away in June during a car accident in Zamora, in the North-West of Spain. arts.ttl: "It's just a matter of time" – Xabi Alonso backs Wirtz to succeed at Liverpool
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso is confident that Florian Wirtz will silence his doubters at Liverpool.

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold sums up Liverpool feelings in one word before Real Madrid clash
arts.sum: Trent Alexander-Arnold could face Liverpool for the first time since his summer move to Real Madrid and the full-back has sent a message ahead of his Anfield return.

arts.ttl: “Always nice” – Liverpool midfielder’s father asked about Real Madrid links
arts.sum: Liverpool host Real Madrid in the Champions League at Anfield later today. Ahead of this clash, Tuesday’s edition of AS has published an interview with Liverpool star Alexis Mac Allister’s father, Carlos. Over the years, the Liverpool player has been linked to Real Madrid but there weren’t any concrete developments.
